mapper.select: SELECT USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, USER.PROFILE_PICTURE, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM user JOIN roles ON user.roles_id = roles.id WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, USER.PROFILE_PICTURE, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM USER JOIN roles ON roles_id = roles.id WHERE user.id = #{project.manager_id}

SELECT USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, USER.PROFILE_PICTURE, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM USER JOIN roles ON roles_id = roles.id WHERE user.id = #{project.product_owner_id}

SELECT USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, USER.PROFILE_PICTURE, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM USER JOIN ROLES ON roles_id = roles.id JOIN PROJECT_USER ON USER.ID = PROJECT_USER.USER_ID WHERE PROJECT_USER.PROJECT_ID = #{id} AND PROJECT_USER.SCRUM_MASTER = TRUE

SELECT USER.ID AS user_id, USER.FORENAME, USER.SURNAME, USER.EMAIL, ROLES.ID AS roles_id, ROLES.DEVELOPER, ROLES.SCRUM_MASTER, ROLES.PRODUCT_OWNER FROM USER JOIN ROLES ON USER.ROLES_ID = ROLES.ID JOIN PROJECT_USER ON USER.ID = PROJECT_USER.USER_ID WHERE PROJECT_USER.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
